text: Opam or OPAM may refer to: ==Opam== *Emmanuel Opam-Brown Akolbire (born 1960), Ghanaian politician and member of Ghanaian Parliament ==OPAM== * OCaml Package Manager, for the Caml programming language implementation * Ōita Prefectural Art Museum (OpAm), an art museum and community exhibition venue in Japan * OPAM, a sculpture park by Lucien den Arend
title: Opam
